__help.theme: Run 'show --list-themes' to see available names. Default is 'onedark'.
__help.filetype: Chroma lexer alias (e.g., go, python, yaml). Leave empty to auto-detect from file extension.
__help.debug: Boolean: true/false. When true, prints header/footer with detected file type.
__help.line_numbers: Boolean: true to show line numbers, false to disable.
__help.line_start: Integer starting line number (>= 1). Defaults to 1.
__help.line_separator: Override separator between number and content. Typical values: 'â”‚' (UTF-8) or '|' (ASCII). Empty uses locale-based default.
